short_description: This function enables users to provide a tailored prompt to the LLM, enhancing results according to their unique use cases or data input requirements. Users will have the option to specify two input columns: one for the data and the other for a question or reference.
long_description: This function enables users to provide a tailored prompt to the LLM, enhancing results according to their unique use cases or data input requirements. Users will have the option to specify two input columns: one for the data and the other for a question or reference.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the questions.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the questions.

input_tables.name: ContextTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the context to answer the question.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the context to answer the question.

argument_clauses.name: ApiBase
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the LLM API base URL for azure.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the LLM API base URL for azure.

argument_clauses.name: ApiKey
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the LLM API Key for azure.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the LLM API Key for azure.

argument_clauses.name: ApiVersion
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the LLM API version for azure.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the LLM API version for azure.

argument_clauses.name: DeploymentId
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the deployment id of the LLM. It takes engine id for azure OpenAI.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the deployment id of the LLM. It takes engine id for azure OpenAI.

argument_clauses.name: ModelName
argument_clauses.description: Name of the large language model to be used for text analytics tasks.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Name of the large language model to be used for text analytics tasks.

argument_clauses.name: ModelArgs
argument_clauses.description: JSON string representing the inference parameters for the selected LLM Model.
argument_clauses.rDescription: JSON string representing the inference parameters for the selected LLM Model.

argument_clauses.name: ApiType
argument_clauses.description: Identification of the cloud platform.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Identification of the cloud platform.

argument_clauses.name: AccessKey
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the AWS Bedrock service access key.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the AWS Bedrock service access key.

argument_clauses.name: SecretKey
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the AWS Bedrock service secret key.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the AWS Bedrock service secret key.

argument_clauses.name: SessionKey
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the AWS bedrock service session key.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the AWS bedrock service session key.

argument_clauses.name: Region
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the AWS Bedrock service region or Google Cloud service region depending on the api type.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the AWS Bedrock service region or Google Cloud service region depending on the api type.

argument_clauses.name: AccessToken
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the session token for google cloud.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the session token for google cloud.

argument_clauses.name: Project
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the gcp project.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the name of the gcp project.

argument_clauses.name: EnableSafety
argument_clauses.description: Specifies if the safety feature needs to be enabled when api_type is gcp.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies if the safety feature needs to be enabled when api_type is gcp.

argument_clauses.name: TextColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the text column to be used as input.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the text column to be used as input.

argument_clauses.name: isDebug
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether error logging is required.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether error logging is required.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function doesn't copy any input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function doesn't copy any input table columns to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: AUTHORIZATION
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the authorization object name containing the credentials, optionally prefixed by the database name.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the authorization object name containing the credentials, optionally prefixed by the database name.

argument_clauses.name: prompt
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the custom prompt.
argument_clauses.rDescription: SSpecifies the custom prompt.

argument_clauses.name: QUESTIONPOSITION
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the position of the question in the custom prompt.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the position of the question in the custom prompt.

argument_clauses.name: DATAPOSITION
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the position of the input data in the custom prompt.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the position of the input data in the custom prompt.

argument_clauses.name: ContextColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the context column to be used as input.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the context column to be used as input.
